text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

text: Before you marry a person, make them use a computer with slow internet.
author: Will Ferrell

text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

text: When mountains crumble to the sea, there will still be you and me.
author: Led Zeppelin

text: We loved with a love that was more than love.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

text: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul.
author: Nicholas Sparks

text: How wonderful life is while you're in the world.
author: Elton John

text: Happiness is anyone and anything thatâ€™s loved by you.
author: Charles M. Schulz

text: I like shiny things, but I'd marry you with paper rings.
author: Taylor Swift

text: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret.
author: Henny Youngman

text: What is done in love is done well.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

text: Marriage is like a deck of cards. There's diamonds, hearts, spades and clubs.
author: Anonymous

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

text: I lost my wife's audiobook. I'll never hear the end of it.
author: Anonymous

text: It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: My most brilliant achievement was persuading my wife to marry me.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

text: My wife says I don't listen... or something like that.
author: Anonymous

text: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
author: Van Gogh
